sub_topic: Using the power rule to differentiate functions
message_1: Find the derivative of the function f(x) = 5x^7 using the power rule.
message_2:
Using the power rule, which states that the derivative of x^n is nx^(n-1), we can find the derivative of f(x) = 5x^7.

f'(x) = 7 * 5x^(7-1)
f'(x) = 35x^6
